project/src/connection.c

00001 /**
00002  * @file connection.c
00003  *
00004  * @date   2009-04-24
00005  * @author Jean-Lou Dupont
00006  *
00007  * \section Overview
00008  *                      This module implements the ``connection`` aspect:
00009  *
00010  *                      - opening
00011  *                      - closing
00012  *
00013  *                      A limited number of connections are supported at any point
00014  *                      in time. When a connection is closed, it is queued for
00015  *                      later deletion: the connection can not be used for any
00016  *                      access from this point onwards.
00017  *
00018  * \section Connections
00019  *
00020  *                      From a client operation point of view, the connection table
00021  *                      is only locked whilst performing:
00022  *
00023  *                      - ``open`` and ``close`` connection operations
00024  *                      - ``add`` and ``remove`` subscription operations
00025  *
00026  *                      at which times the return code LITM_CODE_BUSY might be used
00027  *                      to signal to the client to try again later. This behavior is
00028  *                      necessary in order for the ``switch`` to be in control
00029  *                      position, thus simplifying the architecture and API.
00030  *
00031  *                      Since the ``switch`` is in control, the connection table
00032  *                      is also held in locked state whilst dispatching envelopes
00033  *                      to clients.
00034  *
00035  *
00036  * \section Deletion
00037  *
00038  *                      Connection deletion is performed in the following manner:
00039  *
00040  *                      - the connection's status is changed to "PENDING_DELETION"
00041  *                      - the connection identifier is placed in a stack (pending deletion)
00042  *                      - the ``switch`` inspects the said stack at regular interval
00043  *
00044  *
00045  */
00046 #include <pthread.h>
00047 #include <errno.h>
00048 
00049 #include "litm.h"
00050 #include "connection.h"
00051 #include "queue.h"
00052 #include "logger.h"
00053 
00054 // PRIVATE
00055 int __litm_connection_get_index(litm_connection *(table)[], litm_connection *conn);
00056 int __litm_connection_get_free_index(litm_connection *(table)[]);
00057 litm_connection *__litm_connection_get_ptr(int connection_index);
00058

00060 // PRIVATE VARIABLES
00061 // -----------------
00062 
00063         // ACTIVE CONNECTIONS
00064         // ------------------
00065 pthread_mutex_t  _connections_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00066 litm_connection *_connections[LITM_CONNECTION_MAX];
00067 
00068         // CONNECTIONS PENDING DELETION
00069         // ----------------------------
00070 pthread_mutex_t  _connections_pending_deletion_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00071 litm_connection *_connections_pending_deletion[LITM_CONNECTION_MAX];
00072

00077 /**
00078  * Returns the connection id
00079  *
00080  * @return -1 on error
00081  */
00082         int
00083 litm_connection_get_id(litm_connection *conn) {
00084 
00085         if (NULL==conn) {
00086                 return -1;
00087         }
00088 
00089         return conn->id;
00090 }//
00091 
00092 /**
00093  * Opens a ``connection``
00094  *
00095  */
00096         litm_code
00097 litm_connection_open(litm_connection **conn) {
00098 
00099         return litm_connection_open_ex( conn, 0);
00100 
00101 }//
00102 
00103 
00104         litm_code
00105 litm_connection_open_ex(litm_connection **conn, int id) {
00106 
00107         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: BEGIN");
00108 
00109         int target_index, code;
00110 
00111         code = pthread_mutex_trylock( &_connections_mutex );
00112         if (EBUSY==code) {
00113                 return LITM_CODE_BUSY;
00114         }
00115 
00116         target_index = __litm_connection_get_free_index(_connections);
00117         if (-1 == target_index) {
00118                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00119                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_NO_MORE_CONNECTIONS;
00120         }
00121 
00122         *conn=malloc(sizeof(litm_connection));
00123         if (NULL==*conn) {
00124                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00125                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_MALLOC;
00126         }
00127 
00128         queue *q = queue_create(id);
00129         if (NULL==q) {
00130                 free(*conn);
00131                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00132                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_MALLOC;
00133         }
00134 
00135 
00136         _connections[target_index] = *conn;
00137         (*conn)->received = 0;
00138         (*conn)->released = 0;
00139         (*conn)->sent     = 0;
00140         (*conn)->id       = id;
00141         (*conn)->input_queue = q;
00142         (*conn)->status = LITM_CONNECTION_STATUS_ACTIVE;
00143 
00144         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: OPENED, index[%u] ref[%x], q[%x]", target_index, *conn, q);
00145 
00146 
00147         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00148 
00149         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: END");
00150         return LITM_CODE_OK;
00151 
00152 }//
00153 
00154         litm_code
00155 litm_connection_close(litm_connection *conn) {
00156 
00157         if (NULL==conn) {
00158                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_BAD_CONNECTION;
00159         }
00160 
00161         // FLAG the connection has been about to be deleted
00162         //  Hopefully, this doesn't cause too much blockage...
00163         pthread_mutex_lock( &_connections_mutex );
00164                 conn->status = LITM_CONNECTION_STATUS_PENDING_DELETION;
00165         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00166 
00167 
00168         pthread_mutex_lock( &_connections_pending_deletion_mutex );
00169 
00170                 int target_index = __litm_connection_get_free_index(_connections_pending_deletion);
00171 
00172                 if (-1 == target_index) {
00173                         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_pending_deletion_mutex );
00174                         return LITM_CODE_ERROR_NO_MORE_CONNECTIONS;
00175                 }
00176 
00177                 _connections_pending_deletion[target_index] = conn;
00178 
00179                 DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_close: PENDING conn[%x]", conn);
00180 
00181         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_pending_deletion_mutex );
00182 
00183         return LITM_CODE_OK;
00184 }//

00186         litm_connection *
00187 __litm_connection_get_ptr(int connection_index) {
00188 
00189         if ((LITM_CONNECTION_MAX <= connection_index) || 0==connection_index)
00190                 return NULL;
00191 
00192         return _connections[connection_index];
00193 }//
00194 
00195         int
00196 __litm_connection_get_index(litm_connection *(table)[], litm_connection *conn) {
00197 
00198         int index, result = -1; //pessimistic
00199 
00200         for (index=1; index<LITM_CONNECTION_MAX; index++ ) {
00201                 if ( conn == table[index] ) {
00202                         result = index;
00203                         break;
00204                 }
00205         }//for
00206 
00207         return result;
00208 }//
00209

00212 /**
00213  * Verifies if a `spot` is available in
00214  *  the connection map OR -1 if none.
00215  *
00216  */
00217         int
00218 __litm_connection_get_free_index(litm_connection *(table)[]) {
00219 
00220         int index, result=-1;
00221         for (index=1; index<LITM_CONNECTION_MAX; index++) {
00222                 if (NULL==table[index]) {
00223                         result=index;
00224                         break;
00225                 }
00226         }
00227 
00228         return index;
00229 }//

00242 }//

00246 _litm_connections_unlock(void) {
00247 
00248         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );

00251 /**
00252  * @see _litm_connection_validate_safe
00253  *
00254  */
00255         int
00256 _litm_connection_validate(litm_connection *conn) {
00257 
00258         if (EBUSY==_litm_connections_trylock())
00259                 return -1;
00260 
00261                 int returnCode = _litm_connection_validate_safe( conn );
00262 
00263         _litm_connections_unlock();
00264 
00265         return returnCode;
00266 }
00267 
00268 /**
00269  * Connection validation
00270  *
00271  * @return 0 => not active
00272  * @return 1 => active
00273  *
00274  */
00275         int
00276 _litm_connection_validate_safe(litm_connection *conn) {
00277 
00278         int i, returnCode = 0;
00279         for (i=1;i<=LITM_CONNECTION_MAX;i++) {
00280                 if ( conn == _connections[i] ) {
00281                         returnCode = 1;
00282                         break;
00283                 }
00284         }
00285 
00286         return returnCode;
00287 }//
00288 
00289         void
00290 _litm_connection_lock(litm_connection *conn) {
00291 
00292         pthread_mutex_lock( conn->input_queue->mutex );
00293 
00294 }//
00295 
00296         void
00297 _litm_connection_unlock(litm_connection *conn) {
00298 
00299         pthread_mutex_unlock( conn->input_queue->mutex );
00300 }
